Detailed Description

This file contains the APIs to access the PRM Interrupt device specific functions.

Function Documentation

void PmhalPrmIntConfigRegister ( uint32_t  cpuId,
uint32_t  addr,
uint32_t  regVal 
)

This function helps configure all PRM interrupts with the value in regVal.

Parameters
cpuIdCPU ID of the CPU to configure the register.
addrAddress of the IRQ Enable Register.
regValAddress of the IRQ Enable Register.
Returns
None
void PmhalPrmIntGetEnabledInts ( uint32_t  cpuId,
uint32_t  addr,
uint64_t *  interrupts 
)

This function helps read the Interrupts which are enabled.

Parameters
cpuIdCPU ID of the CPU to configure the register.
addrAddress of the IRQ Enable Register.
interruptsThe enabled interrupts are stored in this parameter
Returns
None
pmErrCode_t PmhalPrmIntGetIrqEnAddr ( pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t  cpuId,
uint32_t *  addr 
)

This function helps read the IRQ Enable register address for a given CPU ID.

Parameters
cpuIdUnique ID of the CPU. Refer pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t for details
addrAddress of the IRQ Enable Register.
Returns
status Status of the APIs PM_SUCCESS - If the address is correct. PM_BADARGS - If the CPU ID is not valid.
pmErrCode_t PmhalPrmIntGetIrqEnAddrShift ( pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t  cpuId,
pmhalPrcmPrmIntId_t  intId,
uint32_t *  addr,
uint32_t *  shift 
)

This function helps read the IRQ Enable register address and the shift for a given interrupt ID.

Parameters
cpuIdUnique ID of the CPU. Refer pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t for details
intIdUnique ID of the Interrupt. Refer pmhalPrcmPrmIntId_t for details.
addrAddress of the IRQ Enable Register.
shiftShift of the interrupt ID in the register.
Returns
status Status of the APIs PM_SUCCESS - If the address and shift are correct. PM_BADARGS - If the CPU ID is not valid.
pmErrCode_t PmhalPrmIntGetIrqStAddr ( pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t  cpuId,
uint32_t *  addr 
)

This function helps read the IRQ Status register address for a given CPU ID.

Parameters
cpuIdUnique ID of the CPU. Refer pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t for details
addrAddress of the IRQ Status Register.
Returns
status Status of the APIs PM_SUCCESS - If the address is correct. PM_BADARGS - If the CPU ID is not valid.
pmErrCode_t PmhalPrmIntGetIrqStAddrShift ( pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t  cpuId,
pmhalPrcmPrmIntId_t  intId,
uint32_t *  addr,
uint32_t *  shift 
)

This function helps read the IRQ Status register address and the shift for a given interrupt ID.

Parameters
cpuIdUnique ID of the CPU. Refer pmhalPrcmSocCpuId_t for details
intIdUnique ID of the Interrupt. Refer pmhalPrcmPrmIntId_t for details.
addrAddress of the IRQ Status Register.
shiftShift of the interrupt ID in the register.
Returns
status Status of the APIs PM_SUCCESS - If the address and shift are correct. PM_BADARGS - If the CPU ID is not valid.
